import React from "react" import "./about.css" import AboutImg from "../../assets/about.png"; import CV from "../../assets/Resume.pdf"; import fileImg from "../../assets/files.svg" const About = () => { return (

About Me

My introduction

Beyond my academic and professional pursuits, I enjoy weight lifting, playing sports like basketball and badminton, and unwinding with video games. I also have a passion for music and spend my free time practicing on my guitar. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and collaborate on projects that make a difference. Feel free to explore my website and learn more about my work and projects!

Download Resume
); }; export default About
